attributes.action: Introduce legislation to force foreign retail outlets in the UK to use English names.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Certain foreign retail outlets are having a right Luftig, they're just taking the mikael. All these oddvar names are viren confusing. If our mula is good enhet then so should our langed. Plaggis mackis tostarp. After all, what is a divan?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
